Me too, I prefer the close button in the upper left corner as well.  I
found nice border themes Iridium-Blueish-0.3.tar.gz and
Iridium-Greenish-0.3.tar.gz but forgot where I got them from.

If you can find, they're worth a try.

Lance

On Fri, 2002-08-09 at 10:30, Matthias Saou wrote:
> Once upon a time, Harri wrote :
> 
> > My personal problem with gnome2 is that all the wm (metacity) themes are
> > windows themes with different colours. :) There's one pretty
> > nice-looking one from the place where you can get "stylish" theme..
> > forgot where, have to look it up.
> 
> I've found some nice Metacity themes, including the Crux one I like so much
> on www.sunshineinabag.co.uk. They've also got nice gtk2 themes and really
> cool gdm ones. My only regret here is that I liked the ability of choosing
> where the buttons were placed in the sawfish Crux theme, as I prefer the
> close button in the upper left corner :-/
> 
> Matthias
